name: Cold Mustard Greens With Olive Oil And Lemon
keywords: mustard greens, side dish, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 pound mustard greens or other dark leafy greens, washed and trimmed
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook greens until bright green and tender, 3 minutes or less. Remove, and plunge into ice water. Drain well; squeeze dry.
Toss greens with garlic, olive oil, salt and pepper. Juice one of the lemons, and sprinkle the juice over the greens. Quarter remaining lemon, and serve with greens.
